synopsis.text: While navigating the complexities of young love at Sakuragaoka High School, third-year student Natsuki Enomoto finds herself in a delicate predicament. She harbors deep feelings for her childhood friend, Yuu Setoguchi, but is unable to reveal her true emotions. Instead, she resorts to using him as a practice partner for confessing her love, leading to a series of misunderstandings. As Natsuki continues to conceal her feelings, she is unexpectedly asked out by her classmate, Ayase Koyuki, adding another layer of complexity to her romantic endeavors. Will Natsuki ever gather the courage to confess her love to Yuu, or will she remain entangled in her practice confessions? Join Natsuki as she navigates through the bittersweet trials of first love, accompanied by friends who are also grappling with their own unspoken affections.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
